text:
@marklevinshow So many questions, 
.@marklevinshow:
A.  CAN YOU READ?  
It's NOT HCQ.
B.  Obama is fit and was taking it for, WHAT?  It's prescribed use:  prevention of MALARIA.
C.  Did Covid-19 exist in 2008?  So, he was NOT sick with Covid while taking it?
D.  How did you get this picture?
